![](2025-images/ugrs.png){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Three PADLAB undergraduates presented at the 2025 [UCR Undergraduate Research and Creative Activities Symposium](https://engage.ucr.edu/symposium), showcasing their work in the lab over the academic year.

Katie Vo presented "The effects of cognitive load on 3D visual search".

![](2025-images/katie_urgs.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Kaylee Cheung presented "Comparing two systems for measuring infant body position".

![](2025-images/kaylee_ugrs.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
Abigail Smith presented "Observing the link between object holding and language development in infants' everyday experiences".

![](2025-images/abbie_urgs.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
